dct_title_s: A map of the peninsula of the Cape of Good Hope, and its neighbourhood, showing the principal hard roads and homesteads, reduced with corrections and additions from the government census map
dct_description_sm: Map of the Cape peninsula and its surrounds from Darling and Malmesbury to Hermanus and Stanford.
The map extends inland to the Cold Bokkeveld, the Warm Bokkeveld, Genadendal and Caledon.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles."
This sheet map was published as a folded map inside a cover, 11 x 17 cm (still attached).
dct_spatial_sm: Good Hope, Cape of (South Africa : Cape)
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
